price: 12. Antes que ellos ya desmintieron a sus respectivos mensajeros el pueblo del profeta Noé, los habitantes de Ar-Ras[960] y el pueblo de Zamud,
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
footnotes: [960]  Ver la nota de la aleya 38 de la sura 25.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣḥābu al-rasi wathamūdu
